CustomField.description: This formula adjusts the recurring amount to be negative if the Deferral is lost. Used mainly for reporting purposes.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Deferral_Status__c , "Closed - Lost") , -( RD_Amount__c ), RD_Amount__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula adjusts the recurring amount to be negative if the Deferral is lost.
CustomField.label: Adjusted Recurring Amount
